sentences.sContent: Additional, because oleaginous bigger cosmetic, can make cutaneous metabolism gets serious obstacle, and cause the facial disease such as acne to suffer from.
sentences.sContent_eng: Additional, because oleaginous bigger cosmetic, can make cutaneous metabolism gets serious obstacle, and cause the facial disease such as acne to suffer from.
sentences.sCn: 另外，因为油质较大的化妆品，会使皮肤的新陈代谢受到严重阻碍，而引起粉刺等面部疾患。

sentences.sContent: This breed of cow is genetically predisposed to intense marbling, and produces a higher percentage of oleaginous, unsaturated fat than any other breed of cattle known in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: This breed of cow is genetically predisposed to intense marbling, and produces a higher percentage of oleaginous, unsaturated fat than any other breed of cattle known in the world.
sentences.sCn: 从遗传学角度，这个品种牛的肉倾向于拥有明显的大理石纹理，出产的牛肉有较高的油脂分布率，其脂肪的不饱和度比世界上其他种类的牛肉都要来得高。

sentences.sContent: Acne sex cutaneous person criterion more Ying Shen uses cosmetic, absolutely cannot put on the skin uses oleaginous cosmetic, should choose the medicaments cosmetic such as acne frost.
sentences.sContent_eng: Acne sex cutaneous person criterion more Ying Shen uses cosmetic, absolutely cannot put on the skin uses oleaginous cosmetic, should choose the medicaments cosmetic such as acne frost.
sentences.sCn: 粉刺性皮肤的人则更应慎用化妆品，绝对不能搽用油质化妆品，应选用粉刺霜等药物化妆品。
